articles.title: iOS 16's editable iMessages may not play nice with older iPhones - The Verge
articles.description: The latest developer beta for iOS 16 includes a messy workaround to ensure that newly editable iMessages can be received on iPhones without Apple’s latest software. It sends a second message with the edited text.
articles.content:
The app re-sends an edited message if youre on an older version of iOS
